Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are discussing important topics that impact our lives including Federal Budget proposals. The Albanese Government is considering cutting billions from infrastructure projects and increasing JobSeeker allowance for people over 55. Meanwhile employers are bracing for new laws compelling them to pay superannuation on payday recouping billions lost from lost retirement income. Additionally the Prime Minister has announced new health facilities to better service residents in rural and remote areas. Finally a new National Emergency Alerting System project will provide instant and prioritized emergency messages in critical disaster situations highlighting the Government's commitment to Australian safety.
